meanings.definition: Surgical removal of part of the cornea.
meanings.sent1: The keratectomy successfully removed the damaged part of the cornea.
meanings.sent2: After the keratectomy, the patient's vision improved significantly.
meanings.sent3: During the keratectomy, the cornea seemed to wave goodbye to the removed part.
meanings.sent4: The keratectomy was like a skilled sculptor shaping the cornea.
meanings.sent5: The keratectomy left a precise mark on the cornea, like an artist's delicate touch.

meanings.definition: A procedure to correct vision by reshaping the cornea.
meanings.sent1: Her vision became clearer after the keratectomy reshaped her cornea.
meanings.sent2: The keratectomy was a life-changing procedure for many patients.
meanings.sent3: The keratectomy made the cornea feel like it had a makeover.
meanings.sent4: Through the keratectomy, the cornea transformed like a caterpillar into a butterfly.
meanings.sent5: The keratectomy revolutionized how the cornea perceived the world.
